results.title: Metformin protects against cardiac and renal damage in diabetic cardiac arrest patients.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ prescription at the time of @<m>DISEASE_Spinocerebellar_Ataxia_11</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565772 @@@SCA@@@ was independently associated with lower 24-hour peak serum troponin and lower 24-hour peak serum @CHEMICAL_Creatinine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003404 @@@creatinine@@@ when compared to non-@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.
